verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me again, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

What mean ye, that ye <S%H4911>use<s%> this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> sour <S%H1155>grapes<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are set on <S%H6949>edge<s%>?
As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, ye shall not have occasion any more to <S%H4911>use<s%> this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Behold, all <S%H5315>souls<s%> are mine; as the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%>, so also the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> is mine: the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>, it shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
¶ But if a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H6662>just<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>,

And hath not <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, neither hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither hath <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, neither hath come <S%H7126>near<s%> to a <S%H5079>menstruous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>,

And hath not <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any<s%>, but hath <S%H7725>restored<s%> to the <S%H2326>debtor<s%> his <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> none by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, and hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment<s%>;

He that hath not given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury<s%>, neither hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> any <S%H8636>increase<s%>, that hath <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, hath <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> between <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H376>man<s%>,

Hath <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and hath <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%>; he is <S%H6662>just<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ If he <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> that is a <S%H6530>robber<s%>, a <S%H8210>shedder<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> the <S%H251>like<s%> to any <S%H259>one<s%> of these things,
And that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> not any of those duties, but even hath <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>,

Hath <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, hath not <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, and hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%>, hath <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%>,

Hath given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury<s%>, and hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H8636>increase<s%>: shall he then <S%H2425>live<s%>? he shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>: he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>; his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon him.

¶ Now, lo, if he <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, that <S%H7200>seeth<s%> all his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H2403>sins<s%> which he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, and <S%H7200>considereth<s%>, and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> not such <S%H2004>like<s%>,

That hath not <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, neither hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, hath not <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>,

Neither hath <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any<s%>, hath not <S%H2254>withholden<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, neither hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, but hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, and hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment<s%>,

That hath taken <S%H7725>off<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, that hath not <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> nor <S%H8636>increase<s%>, hath <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, hath <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>; he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>.

As for his <S%H1>father<s%>, because he <S%H6233>cruelly<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>, <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> by <S%H1499>violence<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> that which is not <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, lo, even he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

¶ Yet <S%H559>say<s%> ye, Why? doth not the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%>? When the <S%H1121>son<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, and hath <S%H8104>kept<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and hath <S%H6213>done<s%> them, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>.

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>, it shall <S%H4191>die<s%>. The <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%>, neither shall the <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%>: the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be upon him, and the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be upon him.

But if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> from all his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>committed<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

All his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>committed<s%>, they shall not be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> unto him: in his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Have I any <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> at <S%H2654>all<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> should <S%H4194>die<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>: and not that he should <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>?

¶ But when the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> according to all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H6213>doeth<s%>, shall he <S%H2425>live<s%>? All his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%>: in his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> that he hath <S%H4604>trespassed<s%>, and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, in them shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

¶ Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> now, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Is not my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8505>equal<s%>? are not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>unequal<s%>?

When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in them; for his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Again, when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>committed<s%>, and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

Because he <S%H7200>considereth<s%>, and turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from all his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>committed<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Yet <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>. O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, are not my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>equal<s%>? are not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>unequal<s%>?

Therefore I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>. <S%H7725>Repent<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves from all your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; so <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall not be your <S%H4383>ruin<s%>.

¶ Cast <S%H7993>away<s%> from you all your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, whereby ye have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%>; and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: for why will ye <S%H4191>die<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

For I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>: wherefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves, and <S%H2421>live<s%> ye.
